properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of transport in atmosperic aerosol model

properties.label: Scheme
properties.description: Method for aerosol transport modeling

properties.label: Mass Conservation Scheme
properties.description: Method used to ensure mass conservation.

enum.label: Mass Conservation Methods
enum.description: Method used to ensure mass conservation

properties.label: Convention
properties.description: Transport by convention

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of emissions in atmosperic aerosol model

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Method used to define aerosol species (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

enum.label: Emissions Methods
enum.description: Method used to define aerosol species emitted (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

properties.label: Sources
properties.description: Sources of the aerosol species are taken into account in the emissions scheme

enum.label: Surface Source Types
enum.description: Sources of the aerosol species emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

properties.label: Prescribed Climatology
properties.description: Specify the climatology type for aerosol emissions

enum.label: Prescribed Climatology Type
enum.description: Specify the climatology type for aerosol emissions

properties.label: Prescribed Climatology Emitted Species
properties.description: List of aerosol species emitted and prescribed via a climatology

properties.label: Prescribed Spatially Uniform Emitted Species
properties.description: List of aerosol species emitted  and prescribed as spatially uniform

properties.label: Interactive Emitted Species
properties.description: List of aerosol species emitted and specified via an interactive method

properties.label: Other Emitted Species
properties.description: List of aerosol species emitted and specified via an "other method"

properties.label: Other Method Characteristics
properties.description: Characteristics of the "other method" used for aerosol emissions

properties.label: Prescribed Lower Boundary
properties.description: List of species prescribed at the lower boundary.

properties.label: Prescribed Upper Boundary
properties.description: List of species prescribed at the upper boundary.

properties.label: Prescribed Fields Mmr
properties.description: List of species prescribed as mass mixing ratios.

properties.label: Prescribed Fields Mmr
properties.description: List of species prescribed as AOD plus CCNs.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of atmosperic aerosol model

properties.label: Processes
properties.description: Processes included in the Aerosol model.

enum.label: Model Processes
enum.description: Processes included in the Aerosol model.

properties.label: Coupling
properties.description: Other model components coupled to the Aerosol model

enum.label: Coupling
enum.description: Other model components coupled to the Aerosol model.

properties.label: Gas Phase Precursors
properties.description: List of gas phase aerosol precursors.

enum.label: Gas Phase Precursors
enum.description: List of gas phase aerosol precursors.

properties.label: Scheme Type
properties.description: Type(s) of aerosol scheme used by the aerosols model (potentially multiple: some species may be covered by one type of aerosol scheme and other species covered by another type).

enum.label: Scheme Types
enum.description: Type(s) of aerosol scheme used by the aerosols model (potentially multiple: some species may be covered by one type of aerosol scheme and other species covered by another type).

properties.label: Bulk Scheme Species
properties.description: List of species covered by the bulk scheme.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of optical and radiative properties

properties.label: Black Carbon
properties.description: Absorption mass coefficient of black carbon at 550nm

properties.label: Dust
properties.description: Absorption mass coefficient of dust at 550nm

properties.label: Organics
properties.description: Absorption mass coefficient of organics at 550nm

properties.label: Non Absorbing State
properties.description: Do organics have non-absorbing state "Phi"?

properties.label: External
properties.description: Is there external mixing with respect to chemical composition?

properties.label: Internal
properties.description: Is there internal mixing with respect to chemical composition?

properties.label: Mixing Rule
properties.description: If there is internal mixing with respect to chemical composition then indicate the mixinrg rule

properties.label: Size
properties.description: Does H2O impact size?

properties.label: Internal Mixture
properties.description: Does H2O impact internal mixture?

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of radiative scheme

properties.label: Shortwave Bands
properties.description: Number of shortwave bands

properties.label: Longwave Bands
properties.description: Number of longwave bands

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview of aerosol-cloud interactions

properties.label: Twomey
properties.description: Is the Twomey effect included?

properties.label: Twomey Minimum Ccn
properties.description: If the Twomey effect is included, then what is the minimum CCN number?

properties.label: Drizzle
properties.description: Does the scheme affect drizzle?

properties.label: Cloud Lifetime
properties.description: Does the scheme affect cloud lifetime?

properties.label: Longwave Bands
properties.description: Number of longwave bands

keyProperties.label: Key Properties
keyProperties.description: Key properties of the aerosol model

properties.label: Model Overview
properties.description: Overview of aerosol model.

properties.label: Model Name
properties.description: Name of aerosol model code

properties.label: Scheme Scope
properties.description: Atmospheric domains covered by the aerosol model

enum.label: Scheme Scopes
enum.description: Atmospheric domains covered by the aerosol model

properties.label: Basic Approximations
properties.description: Basic approximations made in the aerosol model

properties.label: Prognostic Variables Form
properties.description: Prognostic variables in the aerosol model

enum.label: Prognostic Vars Types
enum.description: Form of prognostic variables in the aerosol model.

properties.label: Number Of Tracers
properties.description: Number of tracers in the aerosol model

properties.label: Family Approach
properties.description: Are aerosol calculations generalized into families of species?

properties.label: Repository
properties.description: Location of code for this component.

properties.label: Code Version
properties.description: Code version identifier.

properties.label: Code Languages
properties.description: Code language(s).

subProcesses.label: Timestep Framework
subProcesses.description: Physical properties of seawater in ocean

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Mathematical method deployed to solve the time evolution of the prognostic variables

enum.label: Timestepping Methods
enum.description: Mathematical method deployed to solve the time evolution of the prognostic variables.

properties.label: Split Operator Advection Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for aerosol advection (in seconds)

properties.label: Split Operator Physical Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for aerosol physics (in seconds).

properties.label: Integrated Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for the aerosol model (in seconds)

properties.label: Integrated Scheme Type
properties.description: Specify the type of timestep scheme

enum.label: Integrated Scheme Types
enum.description: Specify the type of timestep scheme

properties.label: Variables 3D
properties.description: Three dimensionsal forcing variables, e.g. U, V, W, T, Q, P, conventive mass flux

properties.label: Variables 2D
properties.description: Two dimensionsal forcing variables, e.g. land-sea mask definition

properties.label: Frequency
properties.description: Frequency with which meteological forcings are applied (in seconds).

subProcesses.label: Resolution
subProcesses.description: Resolution in the aersosol model grid

properties.label: Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

properties.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
properties.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

properties.label: Number Of Vertical Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels resolved on computational grid.

properties.label: Is Adaptive Grid
properties.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics of mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component
